channel.title: Full Screen PI
channel.description:
I am selling this cheaper then anyone else, i will also accept runescape accounts.
#317 Fullscreen renamed [Galkons base] Client
You can choose between the client with 474 models, or 525 models. PM me to negotiate a reasonable cost. Just going to point out that the Fullscreen feature on a 317 server will bring an extra 50 - 100 players.
Payment methods: PayPal - Preferred RuneScape Account RuneScape Membership PIN Onebip
525 look-a-like Client Features:
Equipment switching sounds enabled. Fullscreen/standard size mode. Compatible with all 317 servers with slight server Player class edits. Most 525 Decompressed Models. 525 Emote Interface with fully functioning emotes. Most 474 Maps in their own cache. 474 GameFrame & Interfaces. New RS Chat Engine. 525 Animations & Graphics (Dragon Claws, Skillcapes, Godswords, etc.) Savable account on login. Current RuneScape background fading. (On login screen) Current RuneScape title Background. Toggle hit-points above head, new cursors, and highlight mod chat.
474 look-a-like Client Features:
Client sounds enabled. Fullscreen/standard size mode. Most 474 interfaces. All 474 items & models. Most 474 maps packed to their own cache. Compatible with most all 317 servers with slight edits to the servers Player class. New RS Chat Engine.
*

item.title: Full Screen PI
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Use one account, either use payman or Tia Lewis.

You cannot sell anything on this site besides scar scripts.

Read full topic
